trigger: When electricity is high carbon (by country)
trigger_description: This trigger fires when the climate impact of country electricity is high.

trigger: When electricity is high carbon (by location)
trigger_description: This trigger fires when the climate impact of local electricity is high.

trigger: When electricity is low carbon (by country)
trigger_description: This trigger fires when the climate impact of country electricity is low.

trigger: When electricity is low carbon (by location)
trigger_description: This trigger fires when the climate impact of local electricity is low.
